translations.translation: by those hurling a reminder,
And those that bring down the Reminder
and then cast (Allah's) remembrance (in people's hearts),
and by those who reveal revelations (to the prophets)
And then by those that instil Remembrance into the hearts.
The Mulqiyat that remind,
Then I swear by the angels who bring down the revelation,
and those hurling a reminder
By those who bring down the Reminder,
by those who bring down the reminder,
And those winds that bring down the remembrance.
by those who inspire [God’s] remembrance,
Then spread abroad a Message,
And by the angels that bring the revelations to the Messengers,
and those (angels) dropping, reminding
Delivering a message.
And those [angels] who deliver a message
[77:5] by the casters of the remembrance, that is, [by] angels that descend with the revelation upon the prophets and messengers, casting the revelation onto the [various] communities [of mankind],
(By those who bring down the Reminder) and He swore by those who bring down the revelations,

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: { فَٱلْمُلْقِيَاتِ ذِكْراً } يعني الملائكة والذِّكرُ: القرآنُ

translations.translation: {The angels} are mentioned as a reminder that the Quran is a source of guidance.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ فَٱلْمُلْقِيَٰتِ } الملقنات لحوامل أثقال الطبيعة والأركان
 المسجونين في سجن الإمكان
 المقيدين بسلاسل الزمان
 وأغلال المكان { ذِكْراً } [المرسلات: 5] حسناً من عالم اللاهوت
 يجرونه على ألسنتهم
 لعلهم يتذكرون بها مبدأهم الأصلي
 ومنشأهم الحقيقي
